title: How can I find out about the various equestrian events held at Hugh MacRae Park? Is there an events calendar for that park?
text:
There are a couple of sources you might try:



Carolina Classic Horseman's Association Events:
http://www.theccha.net/events.html



CKS Equestrian Center upcoming events:
http://cksequestriancenter.com/2011events.cfm?show=previous
